name: Asymmetric midi dress
description:
Product description: Dress with a V-neckline and thin straps. Slit detail at the waist and at the hem. Invisible side zip fastening. 
 Availability: In stock, Out of stock, Pre-order, Back-order

name: Geometric print dress
description: High neck mini dress with short sleeves. Buttoned opening at the back.

name: Knit high neck dress
description: Midi dress with a high neck and long sleeves. Flared hem.

name: Shirt dress with gathering
description: Collared midi dress with long sleeves falling below the elbow. Gathered detail on the front. Golden front button fastening.

name: Pleated poplin dress
description: Midi dress with a ruffle collar and bow. V-neck and long sleeves. Elastic waist and pleated hem.

name: Midi dress with buttons
description: Sleeveless round neck midi dress. Golden textured button detail on the shoulder. Invisible back zip fastening.

name: Draped blazer dress
description: V-neck blazer dress with long sleeves and shoulder pads. Side flap pockets. Pleated detail on the front. Asymmetric hem. Double-breasted front with concealed snap button fastening.

name: Voluminous poplin dress
description: Collared mini dress with long sleeves. Lace-trimmed detail on the front. Ruffled hem. Fastens at the front with pearl bead buttons.

name: Poplin cut-out dress
description: V-neck midi dress with short puff sleeves. Cut-out detail at the waist. Contrast floral embroidery.
